text:
`{{ module.image_field[0].src }}`
does not work, I made a table to test the cases
The first table is the result of the module preview.
The second is the result with the same module in a custom quote template
I don’t know, have never noticed a difference
In the former you can add things like `no_wrapper=true`  not sure about the latter. The former is what modules will give you when you copy the field snippet.

Can someone help?
How do I copy the html of a HS email template? There doesn’t seem to be an option within HS to do this?
